name: @emulatorjs/emulatorjs
description: EmulatorJS is a frontend for RetroArch in the web browser.

scripts.build: rm -rf build && mkdir build && cp -r index.html version.txt fonts images data build/ && cd build && zip -r ../build/emulator-build.zip . && cd .. && echo "âœ… Build completed" && node upload-to-r2.js build/emulator-build.zip .env
